Well the internet have hyped this new console that appeared on Kickstarter named OUYA

The idea is that the console will be open to everyone with free SDK and Modding tools, to appeal to the inde game makers and at the same time be cheap and high preforming.

And the big question is if Ksp would fit as a console game and if this console can make Ksp maybe even a better experience than it is on pc?

Start: Menu/Pause

A: Stage

B: Toggle camera/ship controls

X: Toggle SAS

Y: Toggle RCS

Left/right buttons: Throttle up/down

Left/right triggers: Roll

Left stick: Pitch/Yaw

Right stick: Translate side/forward

D-pad up/down: translate up/down

D-pad left/right: ?

...so we have three buttons left. It\'s doable, but you\'d need the camera controls to share with the translation controls.
the OUYA console will use contollers with touchpads according to the kickstarter.
How does Unity work for Android anyway? I\'m really a novice to programming, so it\'s how I\'ve heard that Android apps are coded in Java and Unity stuff in C# that makes me wonder.
